name: AREA93
description:
"They're coming."

It seems like today might be the last day.
But you still have a chance to make a final stand.
Can you survive?

Zombies are approaching from afar.
You are unprepared and must fend them off to survive.
Fortunately, there is a welder behind you, making weapons.
Create stronger weapons to survive this crisis.

-Zombie attacks
-Progressively evolving weapons

- When you start the game, you begin empty-handed.
- Movement is controlled with the keyboard, and attacks are performed with the mouse.
- Defeating the zombies coming from the front will earn you cash.
- Collect cash and give it to the welder at the back to have weapons crafted.
- Hold out until all the zombies have arrived, while continuously crafting weapons.

Zombies can attack unpredictably. Always ensure ample space to maneuver.
Weapon crafting takes time. Consider this and craft accordingly to the situation.
Upgrades are strategic. Plan when and what to upgrade.

I hope this helps! Good luck surviving the zombie apocalypse!

Hello, this is AREA93 developer Kim Juim.

AREA93 is a zombie survival defense game that I am developing as a one-person project. The game is being developed with the concept of defending against zombies and developing weapons.

In addition, we plan to communicate with players through YouTube or Steam and update the game continuously. We will strive for a better gaming experience and develop the game through communication with players.

Thank you.
